result.reason: This is a 2018 UX feedback/enhancement request about inheritance system redesign that was already addressed in comments by a maintainer explaining the existing functionality; no actionable bug exists and the scope of a full inheritance UI overhaul is too large for this fork's roadmap.
result.approach: Would require redesigning inheritance UI to show all properties on folders regardless of protocol — deferred as architectural enhancement beyond current scope
